text: Selçuk Uluergüven (1 January 1941 - 8 January 2014) was a Turkish actor. He appeared in over 80 movies and many television and stage roles. Uluergüven began his theatre career in 1962, at Meydan Stage in Ankara. Uluergüven died on 8 January 2014 in Aydın, Turkey. He was 73. ==References== ==Other websites== * Selçuk Uluergüven at SinemaTürk website Category:1941 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Actors from Istanbul Category:Turkish stage actors Category:Turkish movie actors Category:Turkish television actors
title: Selçuk Uluergüven
